confd:prepare

Full name:

com.github.nodevops:confd-maven-plugin:0.1.0-SNAPSHOT:prepare

Description:

(no description)

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: generate-resources.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
templates List - (no description)
workingDirectory File - The output directory into which to copy the resources.
Default value is: ${project.basedir}/target/confd.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
skipPrepare boolean - (no description)
Default value is: false.
User property is: confd.skipPrepare.

Parameter Details

skipPrepare:

(no description)
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: confd.skipPrepare
  • Default: false

templates:

(no description)
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Required: Yes

workingDirectory:

The output directory into which to copy the resources.
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${project.basedir}/target/confd
